https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/11tfcRpR6xTAKg19PEDtj9mt73w.jpg Long before written language, cinema or television, there were campfire stories. Youth scaring the living bejeezus out of each other on dark nights at summer camp is a tradition as rich and eternal as the earliest campfire tales. Campfire Creepers: The Skull of Sam
